projects.name: The Resistance
projects.desc: Top-10 EngHack W2015 project. Helper mobile webapp to the party game 'The Resistance', eliminating confusing boards, cards, and counters.

projects.name: Match 3
projects.desc: Winning top-3 project at the Kik hackathon. Players enter an online game room using Kik and compete in real-time to find matching patterns of 3!

projects.name: Garden Guardian
projects.desc: A multiplayer, turn-based strategy game made solo at the Winter 2015 GI Jam. Players compete to grow, water, and cut trees on a shared land.
